When a virus interferes with its functions, either the virus is destroyed, or the host is destroyed.

dialogues.speaker: ARTHUR
dialogues.text: Either way, the virus dies.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: Mankind is that virus. Population growth is out of control. Even if you take climate change from the equation, the point of no return passed a long time ago. Fact is, we're only sixty years away from running out of space to grow enough food to sustain this horde of ours. Fifty years from having depleted the seas of all edible seafood. Whether we starve ourselves to extinction, or our carbon emissions raise temperature to uninhabitable levels first, the outcome is the same. The virus dies.  101. 159 INT. HUNTSMAN DINING ROOM - PRESENT —- DAY. 159 Arthur has just finished recounting this to Eggsy.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: So Valentine proposes to take care of the population problem himself.

dialogues.speaker: ARTRUR
dialogues.text: If nebody does, nature will do it for us. Sometimes a culling is the only way to ensure a species’ survival. History will come to regard Valentine as the man who saved humanity from extinction.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: And he’s picking and choosing who gets culled is he? All his rich mates, they get to live. And all the people he rates as clever or talented, he’s keeping them safe whether they agree with him or not.

dialogues.speaker: ARTEUR
dialogues.text: And you, Eggsy. In Jack's honour, I’m inviting you. A new world will rise from the ashes, and you can be part of it. Time to make your decision.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: I‘d rather be with Jack, thanks.

dialogues.speaker: ARTHUR
dialogues.text: So be it. Arthur clicks the pen. Nothing happens.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: The problem with us common types is that we’re light fingered. Arthur starts to wretch.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Huntsman’s taught me a lot. But sleight of hand... I had that down already. Arthur collapses. Eggsy grabs the ear-piece from Arthur's and the PHONE from his pocket. ON THE PHONE: A COUNTDOWN CLOCK. 08:42:59. Seconds tickin  160 161 102.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy has his hands up. Roxy has a gun on him while Merli examines Arthur’s phone and ear-piece.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Okay Lancelot, put it down. It’s verified. Roxy lowers the gun. Eggsy lowers his hands.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Arthur's phone is receiving update texts about getting to safety. There’s not a lot of time.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: What are you gonna do?

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: God knows who's in Valentine's pocket and who‘’s not. We have no choice but to deal with this curselves.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Do you mean... Me as well? Merlin glances at the clock, then back to Eggsy, indicati an odd-locking RETRO EXO-SKELETON CONTRAPTION cn a shelf.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Load that into the plane.

dialogues.speaker: ROXY
dialogues.text: Where are we going?

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Valentine’s base. He's sent the ccordinates in a group text, inviting his chosen people to join him there if they don’t have a safe retreat of their own. EXT. VALENTINE’S MOUNTAIN BASE - NIGHT, 161 We follow a PRIVATE JET flying towards a huge MOUNTAIN. Inside, the pilot looks nervous -- it looks as if he is a to crash inte the rock-face... +..But it’s a PROJECTION. The jet flies straight through.  162 163 103. INT. VALENTINE’S BASE -. NIGHT. 162 The Jet lands. Smartly-dressed GREETERS, wearing ear-piec walk over to welcome the newcomers. INT. CONTROL ROOM - NIGHT. Banks of TECHNICAL EQUIPMENT in here. On a MONITOR, a liv feed of a landing strip. The pilot, PASSENGERS and Greete Valentine is in here with Gazelle,

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: How many more are we expecting?

dialogues.speaker: GAZELLE
dialogues.text: Not many. Most have their own bunkers. I figure we're just getting the really nervous ones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merlin is in scientific mode, dissecting the inner workin of the PHONE and HEADSET as Roxy and Eggsy watch.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: It seems the earpiece can emit some kind of counter-signal to ensure the wearer is unaffected by the waves from the sim cards.

dialogues.speaker: ROXY
dialogues.text: The ones that turn everyone into a psycho-killer.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Quite. Presumably it’s just a precaution. And as I suspected, it can also super-heat the wearer’s soft tissue, in the event that they blab to the wrong people.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: How does this help us right now?

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: It doesn't. m just tinkering

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: while I wait for the phone to reverse-locate the most accessible satellites in Valentine’s chain.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: So we take out the satellites.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: We'll only have time to take out one. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But that’1l break the chain and stop the signal. And you‘ll have dealt with Valentine before he can do anything about it.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Wait, how do we take out a -- A RED LIGHT starts to flash, and Merlin interrupts.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Got it. Brace yourself for landing. Through the plane window, all Eggsy can see is a DESERTED ROAD in the middle of mowhere. They’re landing on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy and Roxy disembark, confused and apprehensive. Merl follows, carrying the odd Excoskeleton that Eggsy retriev

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Lancelot, put this on.

dialogues.speaker: ROXY
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: It was developed as part of Reagan's Star Wars project, but ultimately rejected. It’s quite basic, but it should still work. Roxy reluctantly gets in. Merlin operates some VALVES. A of gasses, and huge METALLIC BALLOONS start to inflate.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: When you reach the edge of the atmosphere, the ballcons will implode. So you’1l need to deploy your missile just before that.

dialogues.speaker: ROKY
dialogues.text: The edge of tthe atmos: re??

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: After you've deployed, you'll need to release for your descent. Fast. Roxy starts rising, balloons near full. Eggsy grabs her h

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: You can do this. She smiles gratefully, nods. And he lets go. Roxy lifts o  165 167 105.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Stop gaping, Eggsy. Time is not our friend. Go and get ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merlin throws Eggsy a SUIT-BAG. Eggsy looks inside, is mo

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: The clothes Jack bought me.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: You're getting in on Arthur’s invitation. You need to blend in.

dialogues.speaker: EGSSY
dialogues.text: And once we're inside?

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: No we. Once you're inside, I need you to connect me to the mainframe.

dialogues.speaker: XT. Y
dialogues.text: Roxy is getting higher and higher. Not enjoying it at all Suddenly, there's a voice on her comms.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Rox? It's me. How's the view?

dialogues.speaker: ROXY
dialogues.text: Hideous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy stands at a mirror, wearing the Huntsman GLASSES to communicate, doing up his tie. He looks good.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: I never got a chance to say... Huntsman are lucky to have you. I’m glad you became Lancelot.

dialogues.speaker: ROXY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Wish I could say the same right now.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: You're doing great. Not much further to go. You’re up next, Eggsy. Valentine’s base is in that mountain. (off Eggsy’s alarm) (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don't worry, that’s just a cloaking device over the entrance. Smoke and mirrors. Shadows fill the plane as they swoop inside the mountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxy tries to sound cheerful.

dialogues.speaker: ROKY
dialogues.text: Good luck! INT. VALENTINE’S BASE - DAY. 169 The Huntsman Jet has landed. Eggsy and the HUNTSMAN PILOT CO-PILOT get out and are met by the eager Greeters. Eggsy hands over his phone to one of them. She taps the keypad check something on it, then hands it back to him.

dialogues.speaker: FIRST GREETER
dialogues.text: Follow me, sir. And your pilots are most welcome to make themselves at home in the staff refectory. One Greeter ushers the Pilots away to a SECURITY SCANNER the First Greeter walks Eqgsy to ANOTHER SECURITY SCANNER FIRST GREETER (CONT’D) Just a formality. I'm sure you've adhered to our no-weapons policy. I do apologize for the inconvenience. EGGSY passes through the scanner. The Greeter leads Eggsy to a waiting MINI-MOKE. They get and drive off. INT. VALENTINE’S HQ LOBBY - DAY. 170 They drive into a vast lobby. It looks like the lobby of five star hotel. Numerous members of THE ELITE gathered h Eggsy gets out and strolls through the room, doing a grea job of looking like he belongs. He passes a sumptuous buf He’s eyeing a CARVING KNIFE on it when A BUTLER approache

dialogues.speaker: HQ BUTLER
dialogues.text: Would sir like a drink?

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Dalmore whiskey, no ice. And a splash of room temperature water.  172 107. The Butler looks impressed. Eggsy walks off and continues subtly scope out the room. Finally he spots: A TEXAS OIL BARON sitting alone on a couch, using a LAPTOP. Eggsy makes a beeline, takes a seat beside him. The butle serves Eggsy his drink. Eggsy nods his thanks, takes a si Then he raises his glass in toast to the Texan.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Society is dead. Long live society.

dialogues.speaker: TEXAN
dialogues.text: Amen to that! My oil won't be worth shit, but I’ll be king of Texas! Bobby Getty. The Texan offers his hand. Merlin comes on to Eggsy’s com

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Stop fucking about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxy scans her heads up display.

dialogues.speaker: ROXY
dialogues.text: Got a fix on the satellite. INT. VALENTINE’S HO LOBBY - DAY. 172 Eggsy shakes hands with the Texan.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Edmund Knight. King of Norfolk, in the not-so-United Kingdom. They both laugh. Eggsy indicates the man’s laptop.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: How do you get on line? I couldn't.

dialogues.speaker: TEXAN
dialogues.text: Yeah, wifi’s down for security. Valentine’s my nephew, lent me one of his. Private network, I guess.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Bh. Do you need a light?

dialogues.speaker: TEXAN
dialogues.text: What? I ain’t got a cigare— Eggsy shoots him with a dart from his LIGHTER. He snatche the laptop from the slumped Texan, quickly inserts A DONG  173 174 175 108. Eggsy gets up... And is floored by a PUNCH! He looks up to see: Charlie. Charlie leans down, talks lo the carving knife we saw before pressed to Eggsy’s throat

dialogues.speaker: CHARLIE
dialogues.text: There's no way anyone would want a low life you to be part of the new world. So I assume you cheated your way to becoming a Huntsman.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Eh?? What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: CHARLIE
dialogues.text: My family were invited. Obviously. (seeing Eggsy reach for his pocket) Not so fast! Charlie reaches into Eggsy’s pocket and pulls out: a bott of aftershave. He smirks, relieved and amused.

dialogues.speaker: CHARLIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hoping to mask your stench, were you? You'll need this even more when you’re rotting in jail. Eggsy wriggles away, squeezes his cuff-links and... BOOM! The bottle EXPLODES in Charlie’s hand. GUESTS run, GUARDS run over. The time for blending in has passed. Eggsy slips the laptop behind the couch and runs In the chaos, he manages to lose his pursuers. At the edg the room, he slips through a SERVICE DOOR. INT. SERVICE TUNNEL -— DAY. 173 Eggsy runs down the tunnel, Merlin in his ear.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: I’m in. Give me a second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The quality of light is getting very weird up here.

dialogues.speaker: ROXY
dialogues.text: Eggsy, I’m scared. Listen, if I don’t survive the fall --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy talks to her as he runs.  178

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Don’t even start. You'll do great girl. Just remember, if you go into a flat spin, relax all your muscles and figure out which way’s up before you correct. And if you can’t, assume delta position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It‘s crunch time.

dialogues.speaker: ROXY
dialogues.text: You‘re a good friend, Eggsy.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Good luck, Lancelot. Fire in three... two... one! Go! Roxy FIRES HER MISSILE.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: And release, now! Roxy pulls the release bar... And begins to plummet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy sprints down the tunnels. He stops at a DOOR, pulls open. Only to be confronted by: A GUARD. The Guard lunges for him and they begin to FIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxy starts to SPIN as she falls. And her spin gets faste

dialogues.speaker: ROXY
dialogues.text: Raaah! Flat Spin!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the punch-up between Eggsy and the Guard continues, he shouts out encouragement and guidance to Roxy.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Relax! Arms, legs, spine, let it all go loose! Know your direction?

dialogues.speaker: ROXY
dialogues.text: No! I’m gonna black out! My head!  180 181 182 183 184 i110.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy slams the Guard against the wall.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Roxy, Delta position! Quick! He throws a right hook and the guard is out cold. But now MORE GUARDS are running towards him. EGGSY (CONT’D) Roxy? Eggsy runs in through the doorway and slams the door shut just in time. The guards try to enter, but Eggsy’s locked

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxy’s eyes are beginning to roll back in her head as she loses consciousness. She’s spinning even faster than befo

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Delta! With all her remaining will, Roxy gets her legs straight thirty degrees apart, arms back. Her spin slows. She blinks back to full awareness, finally righting herse Then she opens her parachute. Seconds later, the SATELLITE EXPLODES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merlin, his computer before him, punches the air.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relief floods Roxy’s face as she slowly descends.

dialogues.speaker: ROXY
dialogues.text: Eggsy?

dialogues.speaker: INT, SECURITY LOCK
dialogues.text: Behind Eggsy, the guards BANG to get in. In front of him another door. BUTTONS beside it. Eggsy punches them.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Well done Rox, nice work. Merlin, how the fuck do I get out of here?  185 186 lil.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: I'm working on that door, wait. Once you're through, you‘ll pass through some kind of cell block. The door behind him is starting to come off its hinges. J in time, the door in front of him CLICKS open.

dialogues.speaker: INT, MAIN CONTROL ROOM
dialogues.text: Valentine is at a bank of SCREENS showing various SATELLI Gazelle approaches and whispers to him.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: Well, just hold whoever the fuck it is there. It"s not like he can do anything from the prison sector. Did you see this, by the way? On one screen, BITS OF DESTROYED SATELLITE float peaceful

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bunch of amateurs just took out Google Earth,

dialogues.speaker: GAZELLE
dialogues.text: Any more missiles that we know of?

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: No. But I’m not taking the risk. Bring the countdown forward to... Let’s see. Know what? Fuck it. If people aren't someplace safe by now they must like living dangerously. Signal is go in five minutes. Gazelle nods and takes a seat at another console.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merlin looks at his screen.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Oh shit. Wrong satellite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Various PRISON GUARDS lie unconscious in Eggsy‘s wake. Hearing Arthur’s phone VIBRATE, Eggsy gets it out. The phone screen reads: 00:04:49 The seconds ticking down

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Merlin? You seeing this?  188 189 192 193 194 112.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of OLD WHITE MEN in suits leap up from a table.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: I can’t shut down the server remotely in this little time. You'll have to do it manually.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of suited POLITICIANS run down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: The prison cells are in front of you. I'm opening them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FOUR SNOOTY-LOOKING WOMEN barricade themselves in.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Who’s in the cells?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David Beckham looks at his phone. Then he accelerates har

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: I don’t know, but you've got to get them to help you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy stands at the beginning of the row of cells.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Help me do what?! Suddenly there’s a symphony of CLUNKS. Locks unlocking.

dialogues.speaker: INT, HUNTSMAN JET
dialogues.text: Merlin clicks away furiously on his computer.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Get back into that tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We track along the row of open cells to reveal, emerging inside: Elton John, JAMIE OLIVER, USAIN BOLT, LADY GAGA,  195 196 197

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valentine screams at Gazelle.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: Shit! Freeze the cell override!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merlin pounds a key, then smacks his forehead in frustrat

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Damn. I can't open any more. You got enough people?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy stares, bemused, at Elton, Jamie, Usain and Gaga.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Who's in the mood for saving the world? I need to get past the guards to Valentine’s control room.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: They gave me some stuff to cook with. Wait, I‘1l get the knives. He sprints back to the cell. Eggsy turns to Usain.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: You and Jamie stick with me. (to Gaga and Elton) You two, create a distraction.

dialogues.speaker: SIR ELTON
dialogues.text: Fuck you.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: I just bloody let you out!

dialogues.speaker: ELTON
dialogues.text: Create a fucking distraction! Cheeky little bastard.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Alright fine, look -- you do what you want. Come on. The group starts to move swiftly towards the door at the of the hall. Jamie catches up to them, armed with his KNI As they pass the remaining locked cells on the other side other still-trapped CELEBRITIES, yell words of encouragem  198 199 200 201 202 114.

dialogues.speaker: ADELE
dialogues.text: Fucking kill him!

dialogues.speaker: STEPHEN HAWKING
dialogues.text: Good, Luck. Everybody.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gazelle looks bleakly at a SECURITY CAMERA MONITOR.

dialogues.speaker: GAZELLE
dialogues.text: I’m gonna deal with this myself.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: I guess we should have had more security. As Gazelle leaves, Valentine flicks a switch and an insan REINFORCED DOOR slams clown. No one is getting through th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merlin looks anxiously at his computer.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Valentine’s shut his security door. We've got to figure out a way in. We've got two minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy moves fast towards the door, followed by the others

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Rox? I need a favour. I’m sending you my mum‘s number. Please warn her. Just in case. Tell her to lock herself away from the baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxy has now landed. Happy to be back on terra firma.

dialogues.speaker: RORY
dialogues.text: I'll do it right now. Good luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merlin studies the map on his monitor.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: There's a fuse box in the tunnel. You can disable the security door.  203 INT. SECURITY LOCK — DAY. 203 Eggsy and the others stand at the door. We can hear the Security Guards on the other side, trying to get in.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: There are a lot of guards... Okay, Here’s what we’re gonna do: me, Jamie and Elton engage them. We’re gonna fight our way to the control room. Gaga, don't fight if you don’t want to.

dialogues.speaker: LADY GAGA
dialogues.text: Oh, I’ll fight, don’t worry. Eggsy hands his GLASSES to Usain Bolt.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Usain, put these on. You'll hear my colleague through them. Follow his directions and run like the wind. {to Merlin, over comms) Usain is handling the fuse box, got that Merlin?

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Roger that. Can you hear me Usain?

dialogues.speaker: USAIN BOLT
dialogues.text: Loud and clear.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Everybody ready? Everyone nods. Eggsy opens the door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FOUR ARMED GUARDS are here now, and all hell breaks loose Eggsy wrestles the First Guard. Bullets spray all over. T god for Eggsy’s kevlar. The guard yells to his cohorts:

dialogues.speaker: FIRST GUARD
dialogues.text: Don‘t shoot the celebrities! Valentine will kill you! Usain breaks away and begins to run as Elton, Jamie and G attack the other guards. Jamie is terrifyingly fast with knives. The Second Guard loses several fingers. Elton is a revelation --- a shockingly dirty fighter, bit and clawing as he wrestles the Third Guard to the ground. Lady Gaga kicks the Fourth Guard in the balls, but he jus picks her up and carries her back towards the cells...  205 206 207 208 209 116. Until Eggsy angles the First Guard’s gun and shoots the Fourth Guard. He falls heavily on Gaga. She tries to get from under him, but she seems injured.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Usain rounds a bend to see a fork in the tunnel ahead of

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Take the right!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valentine surveys the security camera output. Usain runni

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: Gazelle? He’s in service tunnel D. He’s going for the fuse box. Run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gazelle bounds into view. He can see Usain ahead of him. puts on a burst of speed as he runs for the right fork.

dialogues.speaker: GAZELLE
dialogues.text: I see him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy succeeds in knocking out the First Guard with the b of his own gun and races to help Jamie... ..-Who is just now being disarmed by the second Second Gu The guard pushes Jamie away and he smacks back against a wall, hitting his head. He crumples to the ground, out co The Second Guard, now missing several fingers, struggles get a grip on his gun, his eyes on Eggsy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The best race we have ever seen is taking place, as Gazel closes in on Usain.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0O.)
dialogues.text: Keep going! Door on your left! Usain puts on a spurt cf speed and finally reaches the fu box room. He runs in and slams the door in Gazelle’s face Gazelle rattles the handle, furious. It's now locked.  212 117.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Second Guard, his trigger control sorely lacking now, firing wildly at Eggsy until -- BOOM! He’s shot... +.-By Gaga, still on the ground, unable to get up, but no armed with the late Forth Guard’s gun. SMACK!! Elton head-butts the Third Guard, putting him dow Eggsy examines the guns while Elton frees Gaga. She wince GAGA. Nope. You better leave me here.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Shit. They're all out of ammo. Eggsy moves off down the tunnel fast, followed by Elton. EGGSY (CONT’D) How'd you learn to fight like that?

dialogues.speaker: SIR ELTON
dialogues.text: Training with my body guards. And watching Dynasty. But now Eggsy is distracted. As he walks, he pulls out hi phone. The countdown clock says 00:00:19. Nineteen second

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merlin has the same countdown in a window on his screen,

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Usain? Do you see it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More cupboard than room. Behind Usain, one of Gazelle’s BLADES stabs through the door like a sword, just missing

dialogues.speaker: USAIN
dialogues.text: They're not marked!

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Then turn them all off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy and Elton make a beeline for a HEAVY SECURITY DOOR. It's locked. Suddenly a light goes out. Eggsy tries again

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: We're here! Still locked!  214 215 216 217 218 118.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Usain shuts off switches, trying to avoid the blade that now punching repeatedly through different points in the d

dialogues.speaker: USAIN
dialogues.text: I’m trying!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There’s a THUNK from the security door. It's unlocked! Eg and Elton grab it, struggling to pull it up manually.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0O.)
dialogues.text: Nine seconds! Usain, you did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Usain punches the air.

dialogues.speaker: USAIN
dialogues.text: Wooo! Unthinkingly, he steps back... And one of Gazelle’s BLADE comes straight through the door... and straight through h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valentine watches calmly as the heavy security door rises COMPUTERISED VOICE is now doing a countdown.

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTERIZED VOICE
dialogues.text: Three... Eggsy slides under the door. His eyes meet Valentine’s. COMPUTERIZED VOICE (CONT’D) Two...

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: Hey, valet boy. Just in time to witness the birth of a new world.

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTERIZED VOICE
dialogues.text: One. Eggsy’s eyes widen as... A BANK OF MONITORS come to life: images from all around the world show RIOTS breaking out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AN OLD MALE NEWS ANCHOR gets up from his chair, a mad loo his eye. A WEATHER GIRL rushes into view and loops the CA from her clicker around his neck, starts choking him.  219 220 221 222 223 224 225 226 227 119.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People attack each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tourists attack each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Dean, the Gang Boys, Ryan and Jamal are in deadly combat. INT. EGGSY’S MUM'S FLAT! ~ DAY. 224 Eggsy’s mum looks crazed as she tries to break down a doo Behind it, we can hear Eggsy’s little sister, SCREAMING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy rushes Valentine and begins punching him.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: How do I turn it of f??

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: You don’t. Override is voice activated. My voice. And it can detect if I’m under duress. Eggsy drops Valentine and runs to the desk, desperate.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0O.)
dialogues.text: He’s right, I can't override it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gazelle is running up the tunnel. INT. VALENTINE’S HO LOBBY - DAY. 227 The Texan lies asleep, oblivious. The rest of the Elite a watching the MONITORS here and celebrating.  229 230 232 233 234 120.

dialogues.text: The Old White Men we saw before watch a small TV, CHEERIN

dialogues.text: The Snooty Women hug while, on a TV, people kill one anot

dialogues.text: David Beckham drives om a deserted road, radio on.

dialogues.speaker: RADIO VOICE, (V.Q.)
dialogues.text: .»-worldwide reports of violence on ah unprecedented scale. (BANGING, the WHINE) You can’t come in here, what are-- I... I’m gonna fucking kill you!! Now there’s SCUFFLING and sounds of A FIGHT. Beckham smil

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsy’s eyes light up -- he’s got an idea.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Merlin -- remember Swanson? Valentine -- You wanna save your chosen few, you better turn off the sim cards. Merlin now! Do it! A window pops onto Valentine’s monitor. Text reads: SECUR BREACH MEASURES YES/NO. The “YES” box turns RED.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: Not He rushes to the computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On Merlin’s screen, text reads: “SELECT ALL?”. He clicks. INT. EGGSY’S MUM'S FLAT - DAY. 234 Eggsy's sister stands in her cot, screaming. Suddenly, th door SPLINTERS. And, The Shining style, heeeere’s Michell  239 240 241 242 121.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The text on the monitor says: “ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO SELECT ALL? YES/NO”, The “YES” box turns red.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: Okay! Valentine rushes over, smacks his palm on a BIOMETRIC REA VALENTINE (CONT’D) Richmond Valentine. Override code three two ninety nine.

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTERIZED VOICE
dialogues.text: Login accepted. Confirm that you wish to turn off signal to sims.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: Yes! INT. NEWS ROOM — DAY. 236 The homicidal Weather Girl drops the News Anchor.

dialogues.text: Everyone in the market who is left standing, stops fighti

dialogues.text: Everyone at the gun show is dead except one OLD MAN. He d his gun, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A lot of casualties in the pub. The survivors stop fighti and try to help one ancther.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michelle suddenly comes to her senses. She climbs through smashed door, grabs her baby from the cot and hugs her ti  243 244 245 246 247 122.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valentine looks urgently to Eggsy.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: I’ve turned off mine, you turn off yours!

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Uh... Eggsy? I think it’s too late. INT. VALENTINE’S HO LOBBY - DAY. 244 The Elite Guests are gathered around the monitors, confus From one a BLOODIED TV REPORTER is reporting breathlessly

dialogues.speaker: TV REPORTER
dialogues.text: -..No idea what just happened... But it seems to be over... Tchaikovsky’s 1912 Overture begins to play and... -.-the Guests’ heads begin to EXPLODE.

dialogues.speaker: DAY. 245
dialogues.text: Around the world, the heads of Valentine’s chosen BLOW UP -- The Old White Men -- The suited Politicians -- The Snooty-Looking Women -- David Beckham -- Everyone in Valentine’s lobby. It’s strangely spectacu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the security camera monitors, Valentine can see what’s happening in the lobby, and he is livid.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: Fuck you! He places his hand back on the biometric reader. Eggsy sh him away and they struggle, Valentine trying to reach it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside the control room, Elton John is valiantly fightin Gazelle, trying to stop him from getting in. But Gazelle flings Elton aside and slips under the gap in the door...  248 249 250 123.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gazelle runs at Eggsy. An incredible FIGHT ensues. Valent runs to the controls, puts his hand on the reader.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: Richmond Valentine. Code: ten ten. Cancel override. Re-start sims. Eggsy and Gazelle’'s fight grows ever more intense.

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTERIZED VOICE
dialogues.text: Stress detected. Please repeat. We intercut between the epic fight and Valentine's repeat and increasingly desperate attempts to enter the system.

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTERIZED VOICE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Login accepted. Confirm that you wish to start signal to sims. Finally, Eggsy kills Gazelle. He’s never going to be able reach Valentine in time to stop him from speaking. Eggsy pulls off one of Gazelle's BLADES and throws it --

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINE
dialogues.text: Ye-— The blade comes sailing through the air and IMPALES Valentine. He lets out a gurgling death rattle.

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTERIZED VOICE
dialogues.text: Stress detected. Please repeat. Eggsy reacts: total relief. It’s over.

dialogues.speaker: EXT, ISOLATED HIGHWAY
dialogues.text: Roxy is sitting by the side of a deserted highway. The Huntsman Jet lands right beside her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roxy climbs onboard. Eggsy and Merlin are waiting for her

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Welcome back, Lancelot.

dialogues.speaker: ROXY
dialogues.text: Thank you, Merlin.

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: Actually... It’s Arthur now. I’m honoured to report that our fellow Huntsmen voted for me to take over.  251 252 124.

dialogues.speaker: ROXKY
dialogues.text: Congratulations!

dialogues.speaker: MERLIN
dialogues.text: In other good news, it would appear that none of their heads blew up. The organization is clean. (a beat) And now Lancelot is with us, I shall conduct my first order of official business. Eggsy... I'd like you to be our new Galahad. He holds out his hand. Eggsy shakes it, overjoyed. MERLIN (CONT’D) Welcome to Huntsman! Roxy throws her arms around Eggsy, hugs him.

dialogues.speaker: EXT K'S HOUSE
dialogues.text: Jack's mews house. Under a CAPTION: “TWO WEEKS LATER.” INT. JACK’S HOUSE ~ DAY. 252 A FRAMED TABLOID HEADLINE reads: THE SPY WHO SAVED THE WO Beside it is a nice photo of JACK. We pull back to see: it. is hanging on the wall, being lo at by Michelle. Eggsy holds his sister. JB the dog is nea

dialogues.speaker: MICHELLE
dialogues.text: Did he really do it single-handed?

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Must have. I’m sure the papers have reliable sources of information. Eggsy smiles a private little smile to himself.

dialogues.speaker: MICHELLE
dialogues.text: What an amazing bloke. Getting you a job in the tailors, leaving you this place. It’s like he was our guardian angel. Eggsy nods. That part, at least, is true. The DOOR BELL rings. Eggsy hands his sister to Michelle.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: I’ll get it, mum.  253 254 125. INT. JACK’S ENTRANCE HALL - DAY. 253 Eggsy answers the door to see... Dean. Dean reacts in sho at seeing Eggsy looking so good.

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Dean, what a pleasant surprise! Time for those five words. And with that, Eggsy punches him hard. He goes down.

dialogues.speaker: DEAN
dialogues.text: Aaah! You broke my nose!

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY
dialogues.text: Yep. Those are the ones. Dean gets up and moves to throw a punch when suddenly his eyes close and he crumples to the ground again. In Eggsy’s hand: Jack's LIGHTER. Eggsy put on his glasses

dialogues.speaker: EGGSY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Control? This is Galahad. There’s a huge turd on my doorstep that needs cleaning up before me and my mum take the dog for a walk. Cheers, bruv. Over and out. Eggsy smiles, the door slams shut and we... FADE TO BLACK. POST CREDITS EXTRA SCENE: EXT. COLOMBIA — DAY, 254 Much as Eggsy did before, Dean wakes up in the street, na and utterly confused. The Colombian Cop we met earlier approaches him with a sm his handcuffs at the ready.

dialogues.speaker: COLOMBIAN COP
dialogues.text: Hola! Been expecting you. A little friend of mine tells me you work in the drug trade. And off Dean's horrified reaction, we’re gone.
